name: interior garden
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT - game submission to Extra Credits Game Jam #6 done in collaboration with @noshoeshine

Taking care of plants may make you feel better...

  • To buy a new plant, click on its name in the shop, then click is some spot in the shelf to place the plant vase.
  • To buy a tool, click on its name in the shop, then click in some available spot in the tool bench.
  • To use a tool, click on its icon in the tool bench, then click in some plant.
  • To make a plant grow, water it everyday before going to sleep. The timer in the upper right corner show the duration of the current day.

NOTES:

- The plants and shelf sprites were done by @noshoeshine, but most of all the other assets are temporary, including the current ambient music. These were used for development phase only, and won't be used when released.
